Coursework

coursework for DIGH

Course assessment will continue throughout the semester.

If you have any questions on the following assessments, please contact me.

Ongoing

  • ongoing weekly assessment work (20%)

    • discussions
    • exercises

  • class presentations (20%)

Final
  • conceptual project design (30%)
  • conceptual design specification (30%)

Important assessment dates

  • DEV week demo
    • due 16th October 2015 @ 6pm
  • final demo
    • due 4th December 2015 @ 6pm
  • final report
    • due 11th December 2015 @ 6pm

NB: Further assessment details will be posted throughout the semester.

Grading

Grades will be issued for appropriate weekly or section tasks, where applicable, and for each of the core assessments listed above. A composite grade will then be available at the end of the semester for the overall class.

Grades will use the following scale,

  • 100% to 91% = A
  • 90% to 81% = A-
  • 80% to 71% = B+
  • 70% to 61% = B
  • 60% to 51% = B-
  • 50% to 41% = C
  • 40% to 31% = F
  • 30% to 0% = ?
